channel.title: Spring `23 Week 13 :: CC 410 Textbook
channel.description: Resources Slides Edited Transcript Hello, and welcome to the week 13 Announcements video for CC 410 In spring 2023. This week, you should continue working on the milestones around adding a web interface to your project. This week, we’re going to deal with rest, which is a really important concept in web interfaces. And you’ll also learn how to create some forms and deal with form data. And then that all comes together to the restaurant project where you’re going to add a form where you can create a custom item and add it to your restaurants menu.
